content.question: The designers of the terra cotta warriors from the mausoleum of the first Qin emperor of China solved the challenge of creating a project on such a vast scale by

choices.label: creating large numbers of identical sculptures through lost wax casting
hiring many foreign artists familiar with diverse sculptural traditions
incorporating sculptures from other sites conquered by the emperor
shaping varied sculptures from clay with the help of interchangeable molds

content.answer: shaping varied sculptures from clay with the help of interchangeable molds
